short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: product comparison app support Amazon.com, currently support Amazon U.S.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A product comparison extension that helps you to compare products by review counts, positive reviews and negative reviews. Save all potential products into cart, then choose the best product by comparing the reviews. Currently supports Amazon.com (USA). Other websites are under development.
